mapper.select: SELECT sj.sub_year AS subYear, sj.semester, sj.id AS subjecgtId, sj.name AS subjectName, st.id AS studentId, st.grade, st.name AS studentName, pr.name AS professorName FROM cu_stu_sub AS ss LEFT JOIN cu_student AS st ON ss.student_id = st.id LEFT JOIN cu_subject AS sj ON ss.subject_id = sj.id LEFT JOIN cu_professor AS pr ON sj.professor_id = pr.id WHERE ss.student_id = #{studentId} AND sj.id = #{subjectId}
